description: 建設業界向けクラウド施工管理サービス「SPIDERPLUS」を提供。図面や工事写真の管理、検査記録など現場業務をデジタル化し、60,000現場以上で導入実績。鹿島建設・大林組など大手ゼネコンが採用。2022年東証グロース上場。AI機能で建設DXを推進し、累計契約社数は4,000社超。タイ・ベトナム・シンガポールなど東南アジア展開も推進中。
description_en: Provides cloud construction management service "SPIDERPLUS" for the construction industry. Digitizes on-site operations including drawing and construction photo management, inspection records, with implementation in over 60,000 sites. Adopted by major general contractors including Kajima and Obayashi. Listed on TSE Growth in 2022. Promotes construction DX with AI features, with over 4,000 contracted companies. Expanding into Southeast Asia including Thailand, Vietnam, and Singapore.
